packages.name: stringutils
packages.description:
## Module overview

This module provides utility functions to manipulate the built-in `string` data type.
packages.summary: This module provides utility functions to manipulate the built-in "string" data type.

modules.summary: This module provides utility functions to manipulate the built-in "string" data type.
modules.description:
## Module overview

This module provides utility functions to manipulate the built-in `string` data type.

parameters.name: originalString
parameters.description: The string to check whether it contains the `substring`

parameters.name: substring
parameters.description: The substring to find within the `originalString`

returnParameters.description:
`true` if the `originalString` contains the provided `substring`
           or else `false`

functions.name: contains
functions.description:
Checks whether the given string contains a particular substring.
```ballerina
# boolean contains = stringutils:contains("Ballerina", "in");
# ```

parameters.name: firstString
parameters.description: The first string to compare

parameters.name: secondString
parameters.description: The second string to compare

returnParameters.description: `true` if the two strings are equal or else `false`

functions.name: equalsIgnoreCase
functions.description:
Checks if two strings are equal ignoring the case of the strings.
```ballerina
# boolean isEqual = stringutils:equalsIgnoreCase("BaLLerinA", "ballERina");
# ```

parameters.name: stringValue
parameters.description: The string to generate the hash code

returnParameters.description: The hash code for the given string

functions.name: hashCode
functions.description:
Returns a hash code for a given string.
```ballerina
# int hashCode = stringutils:hashCode("Ballerina");
# ```

parameters.name: originalString
parameters.description: The string to search for the index of the `substring`

parameters.name: substring
parameters.description: The string to search in the `originalString`

returnParameters.description:
Starting index of the last appearance of the provided substring
           if the `originalString` contains the `substring` or else `-1`

functions.name: lastIndexOf
functions.description:
Returns the last index of the provided substring within a string.
```ballerina
# int lastIndex = stringutils:lastIndexOf("int values in Ballerina", "in");
# ```

parameters.name: stringToMatch
parameters.description: The string to match the regex

parameters.name: regex
parameters.description: The regex to match the string

returnParameters.description:
`true` if the provided string matches the regex or else
           `false`

functions.name: matches
functions.description:
Checks whether the given string matches the provided regex.
```ballerina
# boolean isMatched = stringutils:matches("Ballerina is great", "Ba[a-z ]+");
# ```

parameters.name: originalString
parameters.description: The original string to replace the substrings

parameters.name: stringToReplace
parameters.description: The string to replace within the `originalString`

parameters.name: replacement
parameters.description:
The `replacement` string to replace the occurrences of
                the `stringToReplace`

returnParameters.description: The string with the replaced substrings

functions.name: replace
functions.description:
Replaces each occurrence of the provided `substring` inside the provided
`originalString` with the specified `replacement` string.
```ballerina
# string result = stringutils:replace("Ballerina is great", " ", "_");
# ```

parameters.name: originalString
parameters.description:
The original string to replace the occurrences of the
                   substrings that match the provided `regex`

parameters.name: regex
parameters.description: The regex to match the substrings in the `originalString` to be replaced

parameters.name: replacement
parameters.description:
The `replacement` string to replace the subsgrings, which
                match the `regex`

returnParameters.description: The resultant string with the replaced substrings

functions.name: replaceAll
functions.description:
Replaces each occurrence of the substrings, which matches the provided
regular expression from the given original string value with the
provided replacement string.
```ballerina
# string result = stringutils:replaceAll("Ballerina is great", "\s+", "_");
# ```

parameters.name: originalString
parameters.description:
The original string to replace the occurrences of the
                   substrings that match the provided `regex`

parameters.name: regex
parameters.description:
The regex to match the first substring in the `originalString` to
          be replaced

parameters.name: replacement
parameters.description:
The `replacement` string to replace the first substring, which
                matches the `regex`

returnParameters.description: The resultant string with the replaced substring

functions.name: replaceFirst
functions.description:
Replaces the first substring that matches the given regular expression with
the provided `replacement` string.
```ballerina
# string result = stringutils:replaceFirst("Ballerina is great", "\s+", "_");
# ```

parameters.name: receiver
parameters.description: The string to split

parameters.name: delimiter
parameters.description: The delimiter to split by

returnParameters.description: An array of strings containing the individual strings that are split

functions.name: split
functions.description:
Returns an array of strings by splitting a string using the provided
delimiter.
```ballerina
# string[] result = stringutils:split("Ballerina is great", " ");
# ```

parameters.name: stringValue
parameters.description: string value to convert to a boolean

returnParameters.description:
`true` if the string is `"true"` (without considering the case)
           or else `false`

functions.name: toBoolean
functions.description:
Returns a boolean value of a given string.
```ballerina
# boolean result = stringutils:toBoolean("true");
# ```
